member.summary: Gets the tag of notification.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the notification is Onging or not.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets a value that determines whether notification is displayed on the default viewer. If IsDisplay property is set as false and add style, you can see only style notification.

member.summary: Gets the event flag. If this flag is true, you can do SendEvent.

member.summary: Gets the sound option.

member.summary: Gets the sound path.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.AccessoryArgs.CanVibrate
member.summary: Gets the vibration option.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.AccessoryArgs.LedOption
member.summary: Gets the LED option.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.AccessoryArgs.LedOnMillisecond
member.summary: Gets LED on time period that you would like the LED on the device to blink as well as the rate.
member.value: Default value of LedOnMilliseconds is 0. The rate is specified in terms of the number of milliseconds to be on.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.AccessoryArgs.LedOffMillisecond
member.summary: Gets LED on time period that you would like the LED on the device to blink as well as the rate.
member.value: Default value of LedOffMillisecond is 0. The rate is specified in terms of the number of millisecond to be off.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.AccessoryArgs.LedColor
member.summary: Gets LED color that you would like the LED on the device to blink.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs
member.summary: Class to get infomation about notification active style.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.IsAutoRemove
member.summary: Gets the IsAutoRemove option of the active notification. IsAutoRemove option lets the active notification be removed several seconds after it shows.
member.value: When 'IsAutoRemove' is set as false, the active notification will not be removed as long as the user removes the active notification, or the app which posted the active notification removes the active notification.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.BackgroundImage
member.summary: Gets an absolute path for an image file to display on the background of active notification.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.DefaultButton
member.summary: Gets the default button to display highlight on the active notification.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.HideTimeout
member.summary: Gets timeout value in seconds when the notification can be hidden from the viewer.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.DeleteTimeout
member.summary: Gets timeout value in seconds when the notification can be deleted from the viewer.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.HiddenByUserAction
member.summary: Gets Action which is invoked when notification is hidden by user.
member.remarks: The property is only reflected on Tizen TV. If you use this API on other profile, this action have no effect

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.HiddenByTimeoutAction
member.summary: Gets or sets Action which is invoked when there is no any response by user until hide timeout.
member.remarks: The property is only reflected on Tizen TV. If you use this API on other profile, this action settings have no effect

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.HiddenByExternalAction
member.summary: Gets or sets Action which is invoked when the notification is hidden by external factor.
member.remarks: If you use this API on other profile, this action settings have no effect

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.Button
member.summary: Gets a button to this active notification style. Buttons are displayed in the notification content.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.NotificationEventListener.NotificationEventArgs.ActiveStyleArgs.Reply
member.summary: Gets a ReplyAction to this active notification style.
